channel.title: Advent of Code on andrewfitzy.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Advent of Code on andrewfitzy.github.io

item.title: 2024 Advent of Code
item.description: The countdown has now begun for Advent of Code and it’s time to start getting ready for the challenges ahead.

item.title: Rewriting History
item.description: Sometimes files get committed to Git that shouldn’t be. We all do it. This post will cover a process on how to remove the mistake without losing the entire repository history.

item.title: 2023 Advent of Code
item.description: It’s that time of year again with Advent of Code on the horizon, this year I will be mostly using TypeScript

item.title: 2022 Advent of Code
item.description: It’s almost time for Advent of Code and I’m going to try some of the challenges again this year, this time I’m trying Go though.
